amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to investing in science, technology, and basic research in the United States.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 521 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 521 proposed by Senator Peters. (consideration: CR S1965; text: CR S1965) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to investing in science, technology, and basic research in the United States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 521 proposed by Senator Peters.
